member.name: T:SharpVectors.Converters.SvgViewbox
member.summary: This is a control for viewing SVG file in WPF applications.
member.remarks: It wraps the drawing canvas, , instead of image control, therefore any interactivity support implemented in the drawing canvas will be available in the .

member.name: M:SharpVectors.Converters.SvgViewbox.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:SharpVectors.Converters.SvgViewbox.OnInitialized(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Raises the Initialized event. This method is invoked whenever IsInitialized is set to true.
member.param: Event data for the event.

member.name: M:SharpVectors.Converters.SvgViewbox.OnSettingsChanged
member.summary: This handles changes in the rendering settings of this control.

member.name: M:SharpVectors.Converters.SvgViewbox.OnAutoSizeChanged
member.summary: This handles changes in the automatic resizing property of this control.

member.name: M:SharpVectors.Converters.SvgViewbox.CreateDrawing
member.summary: Performs the conversion of a valid SVG source file to the .
member.returns: This returns if successful; otherwise, it returns .

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Converters.SvgViewbox.Source
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to the SVG file to load into this .
member.value: A specifying the path to the SVG source file. The file can be located on a computer, network or assembly resources. Settings this to will close any opened diagram.

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Converters.SvgViewbox.DrawingCanvas
member.summary: Gets the drawing canvas, which is the child of this .
member.value: An instance of the specifying the child of this , which handles the rendering.

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Converters.SvgViewbox.AutoSize
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to automatically resize this based on the size of the loaded drawing.
member.value: This is if this is automatically resized based on the size of the loaded drawing; otherwise, it is . The default is , and the user-defined size or the parent assigned layout size is used.

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Converters.SvgViewbox.OptimizePath
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the path geometry is optimized using the .
member.value: This is if the path geometry is optimized using the ; otherwise, it is . The default is .

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Converters.SvgViewbox.TextAsGeometry
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the texts are rendered as path geometry.
member.value: This is if texts are rendered as path geometries; otherwise, this is . The default is .

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Converters.SvgViewbox.IncludeRuntime
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the SharpVectors.Runtime.dll classes are used in the generated output.
member.value: This is if the SharpVectors.Runtime.dll classes and types are used in the generated output; otherwise, it is . The default is .
member.remarks: The use of the SharpVectors.Runtime.dll prevents the hard-coded font path generated by the class, support for embedded images etc.

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Converters.SvgViewbox.CultureInfo
member.summary: Gets or sets the main culture information used for rendering texts.
member.value: An instance of the specifying the main culture information for texts. The default is the English culture.

remarks.para: This is the culture information passed to the class instance for the text rendering.
The library does not currently provide any means of splitting texts into its multi-language parts.

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Converters.SvgViewbox.BaseUri
member.summary: Gets or sets the base URI of the current application context.
member.value: The base URI of the application context.

member.name: T:SharpVectors.Converters.DirectorySvgConverter
member.summary: This converts a directory (and optionally the sub-directories) of SVG files to XAML files in a specified directory, maintaining the original directory structure.

member.name: T:SharpVectors.Converters.SvgConverter
member.summary: This is the base class for all SVG to WPF converters.

member.name: M:SharpVectors.Converters.SvgConverter.#ctor
member.overloads: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the default parameters and settings.

member.name: M:SharpVectors.Converters.SvgConverter.#ctor(SharpVectors.Renderers.Wpf.WpfDrawingSettings)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified drawing or rendering settings.
member.param: This specifies the settings used by the rendering or drawing engine. If this is , the default settings is used.

member.name: M:SharpVectors.Converters.SvgConverter.#ctor(System.Boolean,System.Boolean,SharpVectors.Renderers.Wpf.WpfDrawingSettings)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified drawing or rendering settings and the saving options.
member.param: This specifies whether to save result object tree in XAML file.
This specifies whether to save result object tree in ZAML file. The ZAML is simply a G-Zip compressed XAML format, similar to the SVGZ.
This specifies the settings used by the rendering or drawing engine. If this is , the default settings is used.

member.name: M:SharpVectors.Converters.SvgConverter.Finalize
member.summary: This allows a converter to attempt to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before the converter is reclaimed by garbage collection.

member.name: M:SharpVectors.Converters.SvgConverter.Dispose
member.overloads: This releases all resources used by the object.
member.summary: This releases all resources used by the object.

member.name: M:SharpVectors.Converters.SvgConverter.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: This releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.
member.param: This is if managed resources should be disposed; otherwise, .

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Converters.SvgConverter.SaveXaml
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to save the conversion output to the XAML file.
member.value: This is if the conversion output is saved to the XAML file; otherwise, it is . The default depends on the converter.

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Converters.SvgConverter.SaveZaml
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to save the conversion output to the ZAML file.
member.value: This is if the conversion output is saved to the ZAML file; otherwise, it is . The default depends on the converter.
member.remarks: The ZAML is simply a G-Zip compressed XAML format, similar to the SVGZ.

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Converters.SvgConverter.UseFrameXamlWriter
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use the .NET framework version of the XAML writer.
member.value: This is if the .NET framework version of the XAML writer is used; otherwise, a customized XAML writer, , is used. The default is .
member.remarks: The customized XAML writer is optimized for the conversion process, and it is recommended as the writer, unless in cases where it fails to produce accurate result.

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Converters.SvgConverter.DrawingSettings
member.summary: Gets the settings used by the rendering or drawing engine.
member.value: An instance of specifying all the options for rendering or drawing.

member.name: M:SharpVectors.Converters.DirectorySvgConverter.#ctor(SharpVectors.Renderers.Wpf.WpfDrawingSettings)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified drawing or rendering settings.
member.param: This specifies the settings used by the rendering or drawing engine. If this is , the default settings is used.

member.name: M:SharpVectors.Converters.DirectorySvgConverter.Convert(System.IO.DirectoryInfo,System.IO.DirectoryInfo)
member.summary: Convert the SVG files in the specified source directory, saving the results in the specified destination directory.
member.param: A specifying the source directory of the SVG files.
A specifying the source directory of the SVG files.
member.exception: If the directory specified by does not exists.

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Converters.DirectorySvgConverter.Recursive
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the directory copying is recursive, that is includes the sub-directories.
member.value: This property is if the sub-directories are included in the directory copy; otherwise, it is . The default is .

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Converters.DirectorySvgConverter.Overwrite
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an existing file is overwritten.
member.value: This property is if existing file is overwritten; otherwise, it is . The default is .

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Converters.DirectorySvgConverter.IncludeSecurity
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the security settings of the copied file is retained.
member.value: This property is if the security settings of the file is also copied; otherwise, it is . The default is .

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Converters.DirectorySvgConverter.IncludeHidden
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the copy operation includes hidden directories and files.
member.value: This property is if hidden directories and files are included in the copy operation; otherwise, it is . The default is .

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Converters.DirectorySvgConverter.WriterErrorOccurred
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether a writer error occurred when using the custom XAML writer.
member.value: This is if an error occurred when using the custom XAML writer; otherwise, it is .

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Converters.DirectorySvgConverter.FallbackOnWriterError
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to fall back and use the .NET Framework XAML writer when an error occurred in using the custom writer.
member.value: This is if the converter falls back to using the system XAML writer when an error occurred in using the custom writer; otherwise, it is . If , an exception, which occurred in using the custom writer will be thrown. The default is .

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Converters.DirectorySvgConverter.SourceDir
member.summary: Gets the source directory of the SVG files to be converted.
member.value: A specifying the source directory of the SVG files.

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Converters.DirectorySvgConverter.DestinationDir
member.summary: Gets the destination directory of the converted XAML files.
member.value: A specifying the destination directory of the converted XAML files.

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Converters.DirectorySvgConverter.ErrorFile
member.summary: Gets the full path of the last SVG file not successfully converted.
member.value: A string containing the full path of the last SVG file not successfully converted to the XAML
member.remarks: Whenever an error occurred in the conversion of a file, the conversion process will stop. Use this property to retrieve the full path of the SVG file causing the error.

member.name: F:SharpVectors.Converters.Utils.DirectoryUtils.ErrorModes.Default
member.summary: Use the system default, which is to display all error dialog boxes.

member.name: F:SharpVectors.Converters.Utils.DirectoryUtils.ErrorModes.FailCriticalErrors
member.summary: The system does not display the critical-error-handler message box. Instead, the system sends the error to the calling process.

member.name: F:SharpVectors.Converters.Utils.DirectoryUtils.ErrorModes.NoGpFaultErrorBox
member.summary: 64-bit Windows: The system automatically fixes memory alignment faults and makes them invisible to the application. It does this for the calling process and any descendant processes. After this value is set for a process, subsequent attempts to clear the value are ignored.

member.name: F:SharpVectors.Converters.Utils.DirectoryUtils.ErrorModes.NoAlignmentFaultExcept
member.summary: The system does not display the general-protection-fault message box. This flag should only be set by debugging applications that handle general protection (GP) faults themselves with an exception handler.

member.name: F:SharpVectors.Converters.Utils.DirectoryUtils.ErrorModes.NoOpenFileErrorBox
member.summary: The system does not display a message box when it fails to find a file. Instead, the error is returned to the calling process.

summary.para: This specifies the encoder type used to encode a collection of bitmap frame objects to an image stream.
This is used by the converter.

member.name: F:SharpVectors.Converters.ImageEncoderType.BmpBitmap
member.summary: Specifies an encoder that is used to encode bitmap (BMP) format images, that is .

member.name: F:SharpVectors.Converters.ImageEncoderType.GifBitmap
member.summary: Specifies an encoder that is used to encode Graphics Interchange Format (GIF) images, that is .

member.name: F:SharpVectors.Converters.ImageEncoderType.JpegBitmap
member.summary: Specifies an encoder that is used to encode Joint Photographics Experts Group (JPEG) format images, that is .

member.name: F:SharpVectors.Converters.ImageEncoderType.PngBitmap
member.summary: Specifies an encoder that is used to encode Portable Network Graphics (PNG) format images, that is .

member.name: F:SharpVectors.Converters.ImageEncoderType.TiffBitmap
member.summary: Specifies an encoder that is used to encode Tagged Image File Format (TIFF) images, that is .

member.name: F:SharpVectors.Converters.ImageEncoderType.WmpBitmap
member.summary: Specifies an encoder that is used to Microsoft Windows Media Photo (WDP) images, that is .

member.name: T:SharpVectors.Converters.XmlXamlWriter

member.summary: This converts the SVG file to static or bitmap image, which is saved to a file.

member.summary: Gets or sets a custom bitmap encoder to use in encoding the drawing to an image file.

member.name: T:SharpVectors.Converters.SvgImageExtension
member.summary: This implements a markup extension that enables the creation of from SVG files.
member.remarks:
The SVG source file can be:
From the web
From the local computer (relative or absolute paths)
From the resources.
The rendering settings are provided as properties for customizations.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the path geometry is optimized using the .
member.value: This is if the path geometry is optimized using the ; otherwise, it is . The default is .

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Converters.SvgImageExtension.TextAsGeometry
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the texts are rendered as path geometry.
member.value: This is if texts are rendered as path geometries; otherwise, this is . The default is .

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Converters.SvgImageExtension.IncludeRuntime
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the SharpVectors.Runtime.dll classes are used in the generated output.
member.value: This is if the SharpVectors.Runtime.dll classes and types are used in the generated output; otherwise, it is . The default is .
member.remarks: The use of the SharpVectors.Runtime.dll prevents the hard-coded font path generated by the class, support for embedded images etc.

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Converters.SvgImageExtension.CultureInfo
member.summary: Gets or sets the main culture information used for rendering texts.
member.value: An instance of the specifying the main culture information for texts. The default is the English culture.

remarks.para: This is the culture information passed to the class instance for the text rendering.
The library does not currently provide any means of splitting texts into its multi-language parts.

member.name: T:SharpVectors.Converters.ImageSvgConverter
member.summary: This converts the SVG file to static or bitmap image, which is saved to a file.

remarks.para: The image is save with the format, since that is the only pixel format which does not throw an exception with the .

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Converters.ImageSvgConverter.Encoder
member.summary: Gets or sets a custom bitmap encoder to use in encoding the drawing to an image file.
member.value: A derived object specifying the bitmap encoder for encoding the images. The default is , and the property determines the encoder used.
member.remarks: If the value of this is set, it must match the MIME type or file extension defined by the property for it to be used.
